name: setuptools_scm
raw_recipe:
package:
    name: setuptools_scm
    version: 1.8.0

source:
    fn: setuptools_scm-1.8.0.tar.bz2
    url: https://pypi.python.org/packages/source/s/setuptools_scm/setuptools_scm-1.8.0.tar.bz2
    md5: 49e83e8fee9ac1d356a634707a62e294

build:
    number: 0
    script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
    build:
        - python
        - setuptools
    run:
        - python

test:
    imports:
        - setuptools_scm

about:
    home: https://github.com/pypa/setuptools_scm/
    license: MIT
    summary: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags

extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - ocefpaf
        - kwilcox

about.summary: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags
